=API for find-namespaces=
Usage: 
{{{
(ns <your-namespace>
  (:use clojure.contrib.find-namespaces))
}}}

===(_find-clojure-sources-in-dir_ dir)===
<pre> Searches recursively under dir for Clojure source files (.clj).
Returns a sequence of File objects, in breadth-first sort order.</pre>

[http://code.google.com/p/clojure-contrib/source/browse/trunk/src/clojure/contrib/find_namespaces.clj#31 Source] [http://www.google.com/codesearch?hl=en&lr=&q=[^-*a-zA-Z]find-clojure-sources-in-dir([^-*a-zA-Z]|%24)+package%3Ahttp%3A%2F%2Fclojure-contrib\.googlecode\.com&sbtn=Search Search for references in contrib]----
===(_find-namespaces-in-dir_ dir)===
<pre> Searches dir recursively for (ns ...) declarations in Clojure
source files; returns the symbol names of the declared namespaces.</pre>

[http://code.google.com/p/clojure-contrib/source/browse/trunk/src/clojure/contrib/find_namespaces.clj#63 Source] [http://www.google.com/codesearch?hl=en&lr=&q=[^-*a-zA-Z]find-namespaces-in-dir([^-*a-zA-Z]|%24)+package%3Ahttp%3A%2F%2Fclojure-contrib\.googlecode\.com&sbtn=Search Search for references in contrib]----
===(_find-namespaces-in-jarfile_ jarfile)===
<pre> Searches the JAR file for Clojure source files containing (ns ...)
declarations.  Returns a sequence of the symbol names of the
declared namespaces.</pre>

[http://code.google.com/p/clojure-contrib/source/browse/trunk/src/clojure/contrib/find_namespaces.clj#96 Source] [http://www.google.com/codesearch?hl=en&lr=&q=[^-*a-zA-Z]find-namespaces-in-jarfile([^-*a-zA-Z]|%24)+package%3Ahttp%3A%2F%2Fclojure-contrib\.googlecode\.com&sbtn=Search Search for references in contrib]----
===(_find-namespaces-on-classpath_)===
<pre> Searches CLASSPATH (both directories and JAR files) for Clojure

===(_read-file-ns-decl_ file)===
<pre> Attempts to read a (ns ...) declaration from file, and returns the
unevaluated form.  Returns nil if read fails, or if the first form
is not a ns declaration.</pre>

[http://code.google.com/p/clojure-contrib/source/browse/trunk/src/clojure/contrib/find_namespaces.clj#49 Source] [http://www.google.com/codesearch?hl=en&lr=&q=[^-*a-zA-Z]read-file-ns-decl([^-*a-zA-Z]|%24)+package%3Ahttp%3A%2F%2Fclojure-contrib\.googlecode\.com&sbtn=Search Search for references in contrib]----
